CmdLine: cd /tmp   && apt-get update   && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends bsdtar curl   && curl -s -O http://download.gisgraphy.com/releases/gisgraphy-$GISGRAPHY_VERSION.zip   && echo "$GISGRAPHY_MD5  gisgraphy-$GISGRAPHY_VERSION.zip" > gisgraphy-$GISGRAPHY_VERSION.zip.md5   && md5sum -c gisgraphy-$GISGRAPHY_VERSION.zip.md5   && bsdtar -C /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/ -x -f /tmp/gisgraphy-$GISGRAPHY_VERSION.zip --strip-components=2 *sql/create_tables.sql */sql/insert_users.sql   && rm -f /tmp/gisgraphy*   && apt-get purge -y bsdtar curl   && apt-get autoremove --purge -y   && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d   && mv postgis.sh 10-postgis.sh   && mv create_tables.sql 20-create_tables.sql   && mv insert_users.sql 30-insert_users.sql
Commands.Name: run
